data.body:

1. set insertSpaces: true & tabSize: 2 & **formatOnType: true**
2. finish a line in c# tabs converted to wrong number of spaces

formatOnType:off

data.title: Include CLI in Linux zip archive and support custom install locations
data.body:
The launcher/CLI script should be included in the main directory and symlinked to from `/usr/bin`.

See https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/4398, the main program directory should be complete.

data.title: Mouse column selection odd for vscode-docs LICENSE.md
data.body:
- VSCode Version:alpha 0.10.12
- OS Version:Windows 7, WIndows 10

Steps to Reproduce:
1. clone vscode-docs 
2. Open LICENSE.md
3. Try Shift+Alt mouse select move on first paragraph - works as expects
4. Shift+Alt mouse select move on second paragraph - selection also goes to the left when moving the mouse to the right.
5. Shift+Alt mouse select move on third paragraph - no selection

Other markdown files seem to mouse column select correctly.

milestone.title: Backlog
milestone.description: Work not yet planned for a specific release.

data.body:
It would be great to be able to open the preview window for Markdown in a separate window, so that I can, for example, have the preview projected to a TV-Screen, which everyone sees, while i got the Markdown on my laptop. That way, I could take notes in markdown and have them immediately on the screen, so everyone sees it.

Currently therefor I need to use md-server, which requires me to save the file always, before it's being updated by md-server.

data.title: Forward wordwise delete (Ctrl+Del) deletes whole line if performed at EOL?
data.body:
Not a feature but an annoyance: 

I perform the following things rather often: 
Have code like this: 

```
One Two Three
Four Five Six
```

If I (efficiently) want to remove "Two Three" and join "Five Six" to result in: 

```
One Four Five Six
```

I should have to perform only 4 repeated strokes of Ctrl+Del. 
I place the cursor before "Two" and repeatedly press Ctrl+Del, which works in most editors, except VS Code, where it works only until I end up at the end of the line. Wordwise deleting Two and Three is fine, but pressing Ctrl+Del at the end of the line deletes the whole line, which is IMHO not the intended effect of joining the contents of the following line (and removing leading whitespace). 
So instead of quickly joining contents I end up having to carefully pay attention and stop at the end of the line, release Ctrl and join the lines with Del only. This is suboptimal. 
I suspect this is not a feature, since deleting lines is usually not performed by placing the cursor at the end and pressing Ctrl+Del? 

Thanks for fixing this.

data.title: os.homedir() is only supported in node >= 4
data.body:
@Tyriar please fix, I pushed a workaround here: https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/commit/faffb7df995482275996535681d141e5a71560b8

I think we should still allow to build on older node.js versions unless there is a major reason otherwise.

data.title: Adding C/C++ extension to recommended list of plugins
data.body:
Add the Microsoft C/C++ extension for VSCode to the list of recommended plugins

Fully Qualified Name: ms-vscode.C/CppTools
Extensions: .c, .cpp, .h, .hpp, .cc, .cxx, .hh, .hxx
